name: AutoCAD Drawing Interchange Attribute File
summary: Learn about .DXX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DXX files are used for extracting smaller amounts of information from a drawing that can be used interchangeably with other CAD applications.

description: Data file created by AutoCAD, an application used for creating 3D design drawings; may contain drawing block reference, attribute, and end-of-sequence objects; can only store a subset of information that can be saved in a .DXF file.
